akn:subsection.akn:heading: Use in the Medicare fee-for-service program

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Use in the Medicare fee-for-service program The Secretary shall use predictive modeling and other analytics technologies (in this section referred to as “predictive analytics technologies”) to identify improper claims for reimbursement and to prevent the payment of such claims under the Medicare fee-for-service program.
